CreateWorkflow.name: CreateWorkflow
CreateWorkflow.documentation: Create a workflow to orchestrate your migrations.

CreateWorkflowStep.name: CreateWorkflowStep
CreateWorkflowStep.documentation: Create a step in the migration workflow.

CreateWorkflowStepGroup.name: CreateWorkflowStepGroup
CreateWorkflowStepGroup.documentation: Create a step group in a migration workflow.

DeleteWorkflow.name: DeleteWorkflow
DeleteWorkflow.documentation: Delete a migration workflow. You must pause a running workflow in Migration Hub Orchestrator console to delete it.

DeleteWorkflowStep.name: DeleteWorkflowStep
DeleteWorkflowStep.documentation: Delete a step in a migration workflow. Pause the workflow to delete a running step.

DeleteWorkflowStepGroup.name: DeleteWorkflowStepGroup
DeleteWorkflowStepGroup.documentation: Delete a step group in a migration workflow.

GetTemplate.name: GetTemplate
GetTemplate.documentation: Get the template you want to use for creating a migration workflow.

GetTemplateStep.name: GetTemplateStep
GetTemplateStep.documentation: Get a specific step in a template.

GetTemplateStepGroup.name: GetTemplateStepGroup
GetTemplateStepGroup.documentation: Get a step group in a template.

GetWorkflowStep.name: GetWorkflowStep
GetWorkflowStep.documentation: Get a step in the migration workflow.

GetWorkflowStepGroup.name: GetWorkflowStepGroup
GetWorkflowStepGroup.documentation: Get the step group of a migration workflow.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.documentation: List the tags added to a resource.

ListTemplateStepGroups.name: ListTemplateStepGroups
ListTemplateStepGroups.documentation: List the step groups in a template.

ListTemplates.name: ListTemplates
ListTemplates.documentation: List the templates available in Migration Hub Orchestrator to create a migration workflow.

ListWorkflowStepGroups.name: ListWorkflowStepGroups
ListWorkflowStepGroups.documentation: List the step groups in a migration workflow.

RetryWorkflowStep.name: RetryWorkflowStep
RetryWorkflowStep.documentation: Retry a failed step in a migration workflow.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.documentation: Tag a resource by specifying its Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

UpdateWorkflowStep.name: UpdateWorkflowStep
UpdateWorkflowStep.documentation: Update a step in a migration workflow.

UpdateWorkflowStepGroup.name: UpdateWorkflowStepGroup
UpdateWorkflowStepGroup.documentation: Update the step group in a migration workflow.

AccessDeniedException.documentation: You do not have sufficient access to perform this action.

ConflictException.documentation: This exception is thrown when an attempt to update or delete a resource would cause an inconsistent state.

applicationConfigurationId.documentation: The configuration ID of the application configured in Application Discovery Service.

inputParameters.documentation: The input parameters required to create a migration workflow.

stepTargets.documentation: The servers on which a step will be run.

tags.documentation: The tags to add on a migration workflow.

clientToken.documentation: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. For more information, see Idempotency in the Smithy documentation.

tags.documentation: The tags to add to the migration workflow template.

templateId.documentation: The ID of the migration workflow template.

templateArn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the migration workflow template. The format for an Migration Hub Orchestrator template ARN is arn:aws:migrationhub-orchestrator:region:account:template/template-abcd1234. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the AWS General Reference.

tags.documentation: The tags added to the migration workflow template.

workflowId.documentation: The ID of the migration workflow that will contain the step group.

tools.documentation: List of AWS services utilized in a migration workflow.

creationTime.documentation: The time at which the step group is created.

stepActionType.documentation: The action type of the step. You must run and update the status of a manual step for the workflow to continue after the completion of the step.

workflowStepAutomationConfiguration.documentation: The custom script to run tests on source or target environments.

stepTarget.documentation: The servers on which a step will be run.

outputs.documentation: The key value pairs added for the expected output.

templateClass.documentation:
The class of the migration workflow template. The available template classes are:

  • A2C

  • MGN

  • SAP_MULTI

  • SQL_EC2

  • SQL_RDS

  • VMIE

documentation: This API reference provides descriptions, syntax, and other details about each of the actions and data types for AWS Migration Hub Orchestrator. The topic for each action shows the API request parameters and responses. Alternatively, you can use one of the AWS SDKs to access an API that is tailored to the programming language or platform that you're using.
